description.value:
Fear

Aura 5

Any enemy within the aura takes a -2 penalty to saving throws.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+33 vs AC; 2d10+9 damage, and the target is immobilized and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+33 vs AC; 1d10+9 damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes a claw attack against one target and a tail lash attack against another target.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy misses the dragon with a melee attack, at-will

The dragon makes a tail lash attack against the triggering enemy.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Acid

Standard

Close blast 5

3d10+7 acid damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares. The target also takes ongoing 5 acid damage and is immobilized (save ends both).

Encounter ✦ Acid

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +32 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Recharge 6

Close burst 5

Targets immobilized enemies; +32 vs Fortitude; the target is petrified (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is immobilized (save ends). A creature that fails a saving throw against this immobilized condition becomes petrified again as if hit by the stone's embrace power, including this aftereffect.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Area burst 5 within 20, centered on the triggering creature

Trigger: When a creature within 20 squares fails a saving throw against being petrified, at-will

+32 vs Fortitude; the target is petrified (save ends). The gray dragon is immune to this attack, and using this power does not provoke opportunity attacks. Aftereffect: The target is immobilized (save ends). A creature that fails a saving throw against this immobilized condition becomes petrified again as if hit by the infectious petrification power, including this aftereffect.

Alignment Evil

Passive Perception 30 | Insight 30
